brand_info.name: ASICS
brand_info.positioning: Performance sports brand rooted in sports science and human-centric innovation, focused on running and athletic movement to improve physical and mental well-being.
brand_info.vision: To uplift the world through sport by improving physical and mental well-being.
brand_info.mission: To provide innovative, high-quality performance products inspired by sports science and designed to support a sound mind in a sound body.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1949 in Kobe, Japan by Kihachiro Onitsuka as Onitsuka Co., Ltd., with the goal of helping Japanese youth rebuild post-war society through sport; later evolved into ASICS, an acronym of the Latin phrase 'Anima Sana In Corpore Sano'.

brand_values.brand_promise: Scientifically engineered footwear and apparel that enhance athletic performance while supporting long-term physical and mental health.
differentiators: Deep integration of biomechanics and sports science research
Strong credibility in running and endurance sports
Balanced focus on performance, injury prevention, and mental well-being
non_negotiables: Athlete and runner well-being over pure aesthetics
Functional authenticity across all sports categories

psychographics.lifestyle: People who train consistently, value long-term health, and approach sport as a disciplined, mindful practice
psychographics.behavior: Invests in research-driven footwear and apparel, seeks expert validation, repeats purchases within trusted franchises, prioritizes comfort and biomechanics

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Educational and performance-led with clear explanations grounded in science and athlete insight
tone_donts: Fashion-first language that undermines performance trust

logo.primary_logo: ASICS logotype with signature curved stripe symbol
logo.usage_rules: Maintain clear space and legibility; never distort or apply decorative effects
logo.lockup_behavior: Often placed cleanly as an end-card or discreet corner signature
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the ASICS wordmark

color_system.color_usage_rules: Blue-forward system communicating trust and performance; accent colors used sparingly to support product visibility

typography.primary_font: Clean modern sans-serif with technical clarity

layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-led with clear informational overlays when needed
layout_principles.alignment: Clean, disciplined alignment favoring clarity and balance

preferred_photographers: Varies by discipline; consistent performance and running-focused language
style.camera_feel: Controlled realism emphasizing form, stride, and biomechanics
style.pose_guidelines: Running and sport-specific movement; efficient posture; moments of flow and concentration
style.casting_attitude: Real athletes and runners; composed, determined, grounded

technical.lighting: Natural daylight or soft directional light
technical.depth_of_field: Medium to shallow to isolate athlete while maintaining context
technical.color_grading: Natural, cool-balanced tones with accurate material rendering

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Footwear geometry, cushioning systems, and fit must be clearly readable

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts and slow-motion inserts to highlight mechanics when appropriate

visual_dos: Use clean environments that support analysis of movement

digital.tone_adjustment: More educational and technical online; calm motivational cues on social

platform_behavior.Instagram: Running motion, athlete routines, calm performance visuals
platform_behavior.Website: Science-led product pages with clear explanations and fit guidance
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Training insights, product innovation stories, athlete research highlights

print.paper: Clean commercial stock with neutral finish
print.cover_rules: Athlete-in-motion or product detail with restrained copy and clear ASICS mark

logo_misuse_examples: Decorative effects applied to the ASICS mark
